title: [Massive] Language Course Based on Personal Learning Environments (PLE) for Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and smartphone usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners are familiar with using simple learning tools via smartphones but have limited proficiency in PC-based environments. The focus is on strengthening goal-setting and time-management skills through formative assessments with continuous feedback

learning_goals: Learners can establish weekly learning goals and detailed action plans, and record/check them daily via smartphone.
Learners can write self-assessment reports through peer feedback sessions and derive at least three improvement points.
Learners can independently search for and effectively utilize at least two external resources (apps, online materials, etc.) required for language learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
